blank1_info_sec2 = 103-2 Motoshiro-cho, Chūō-ku, Hamamatsu-shi, Shizuoka-ken 430-8652 | website = | footnotes = }} is a ward in Hamamatsu, Shizuoka, Japan. It is in south of the city. Hamamatsu Castle, Lake Hamana and Hamamatsu Station are here. There are many stores and companies here. This is the smallest ward in the city, but the most people live in.区再編ガイドブック（広報はままつ臨時号）PDF版 (in Japanese) Hamamatsu City, November 5, 2023 It is next to Hamana-ku, Kosai, Shizuoka, and Iwata, Shizuoka. == History== *January 1, 2024 - Old wards of Naka-ku, Higashi-ku, Nishi-ku, Minami-ku, and Mikatagahara in Kita-ku become Chūō-ku. ==Sources== Category:Settlements in Shizuoka Prefecture Category:Hamamatsu
title: Chūō-ku, Hamamatsu
